about_the_game:
EmyLiveShow: Case of Four Hot Witnesses is an erotic visual novel with the dice skill check mechanic. Improve your logic and charisma to interrogate the mysterious witnesses, learn their secrets and, of course, solve the main mystery... What exactly is your first case? Is the victim murdered or just missing?!

  • 4 compatible romantic options. The heroines are not always easy to approach. Their statements can be contradictory... Behind their teasing lies valuable information and obvious flirting. And if you get along with more than one girl, you can expect some interesting surprises.

  • Customizable protagonist. Choose your gender, appearance, and name. Make yourself into a character or let your creativity run wild!

  • Animated CG illustrations. The erotic scenes are carefully drawn and animated. The POV perspective lets you put yourself in the place of the protagonist.

  • Exciting plot full of references. The story plays with various detective and dramatic clichés. Many of the game's characters have unusual hobbies that they bring to the table, even if it's out of place...

  • EmyLiveShow game series spin-off. Team Emily continues to experiment and collaborate with new artists and writers! Since Case of Four Hot Witnesses is not tied to the other games events, it could easily be your first EmyLiveShow hentai vtubers story.

The game reveals the topics of: LGBTQ+ friendly, mistress, BDSM, threesome, group sex‎, kink, masochism, sadism, sadomasochism, dominant, submissive, bondage, male dominance/maledom, male submission, female dominance/femdom, female submission, dominatrix, rough sex, masturbation, voyeurism, sexual roles‎, sex toys, oral sex, vaginal sex, anal sex

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains materials that are not suitable for all ages, not suitable for viewing at work: sex scenes, sex toys usage, same-sex relationships and sex, group sex, masturbation, discussions of sex, partial and complete nudity
